name: Super Mario is Triggered
description:
Story:

After a long day of plumbing, Super Mario has had enough. He gets his AR-15 out and heads down to Princess Peach's Castle. There, he finds some Goombas and starts to massacre them. He even eats mushrooms because he is addicted to them. Eventually, the Goombas maul Mario to death.

Gameplay:

- Run around an arena in Peach's Castle

- Shoot Goombas to increase your kill count

- More Goombas will spawn over time

- Touch Super Mushrooms to increase your ammo

- If you get hit too many times then you will die

Controls:

- WASD to move

- Mouse to aim

- Left click to shoot

- Space to jump

- Shift to walk slowly
